laby 𓁺 girl ♀

𓁿 strange entity with a laptop 𓁿

i prefer to be secluded. i am autistic. i have an incredibly wide variety of interests and hobbies. i have been drawing digitally for 8+ years. my absolute favorite musical artists in the world will always be susumu hirasawa, jun togawa, and nashimoto ui. i hate talking about myself extensively because i would rather be relatively unknown, and i don't like people who list 999999 billion things about themselves on their about pages.

you will not find any of my major social media links on here, i prefer to not leave trails on my presences. you can ask for my listography, or find it yourself if you know what to do...

i want to hold whatever opinions i feel like and like whatever media i want regardless to if its deemed "problematic" by online c*rrd/r*ntry discoursers or not. i really do not care. please don't be my friend if you will condemn me for this. i am against dnis

some songs that i really like:

Susumu Hirasawa - Amputee Gerbera-E
KAKU P-MODEL - Darkness Pi Duai
Jun Togawa - Odorenai
Nashimoto Ui - A Stranger Is Dying Somewhere
Nashimoto Ui - Please Send Me A Letter

I taste like Smoke.
I'm an unusual taste; I can be strong and potent, or I can be a mere hint, almost not there. I can blow away on the wind, or I can stick to your clothes that you left out when your neighbour was having a bonfire. I'm mean that way. What Flavour Are You?
